title: Authentic Optimum Nutrition protein in Delhi.
selftext:
**Help Needed:** Looks like they launched [https://www.optimumnutrition.co.in](https://www.optimumnutrition.co.in), is this the official website or run by a reseller? Is Nykaaman legit for ON? Any physical stores in Delhi that are tried and tested?

Thanks in advance.
comments:
>  is this the official website  
  
Yes
